subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alex Ramirez, 37, a Venezuelan who has played in Japan since 2000, recently reached a combined 2,000 hits in his pro career, and is in range of having 2,000 hits in Japan.
snippet: Alex Ramirez, 37, a Venezuelan who has played in Japan since 2000, recently reached a combined 2,000 hits in his pro career, and is in range of having 2,000 hits in Japan.
